Headline: Yellow Line Experiencing Delays; Boarding change at Howard
ShortDescription: Yellow Line service running w/delays due to track switching problems at Howard; board all trains on the Howard-bound Red Line side at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line service is running with delays due to track switching problems at Howard.

Board/exit all trains on the Howard-bound Red Line side of the platform at Howard station.

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running with significant delays from the area of Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with significant delays from the area of Howard.

We are moving and crews are working to restore normal service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
